author: Si_UKNZ
title: Truck is great, otherwise unremarkable
review:
Worth it for the green truck

Pros
- Green truck is a great design, v attractive and simple, interesting building technique to get the 3-wide bricks centred on the 4-wide base.
- Security van not bad design but v playable as you get money to put in the back of it.

Cons
- Road furniture less interesting than the other "box makes a road" sets.
- Road doesnt stay flat too well when folded out

My racers 'road in a box' sets ranked;
1st - 8197: Highway Chaos; best - fast cars, interesting road furniture.
2nd - 8199: Security Smash; good - great truck, dull road furniture.
3rd - 8124: Ice Rally; good cars, dull road furniture.
4th - 8198: Ramp Crash; good - cars just OK overall, road furniture not v interesting.

author: legocarl
title: nice price
review:
overall

the best racers set ever made. i love the inquiry sign and the honest bobs warehouse is the bad guy's warehouse

my list over "road in box" is following here:

1:st security smash

2:st ferrari f1 racers

3:st thunder raceway

4:st ice rally

building experience

the road has only around 30 parts

Minifigures

no minifigures included in this set but it included "minicars"

The build

the build was really boring but the truck was funny to build becuose 2x2-3x2-4x2 steps

value for money

its a race track included 2 cars for 149 sek/14,99 usd was a nice price

the end
